name: Tor: Man on Wheels
description:
In this game, you play as Thor trying to get back to your hammer. However you're stuck in a wheelchair.

Controls: 

Use Q or E to choose a single wheel, or both to choose both.

Slide the mouse Forward/backwars to spin the selected wheels

Select one wheel and press S to be able to spin in place

Use mouse scroll to balance/tilt

R to reset

Use Ctrl + Mouse to orbit camera

Atl + F4 to exit
